org.smartfrog.sfcore.workflow.components
Class Terminator

java.lang.Object
  org.smartfrog.sfcore.reference.RemoteReferenceResolverHelperImpl
      org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.PrimImpl
          org.smartfrog.sfcore.workflow.eventbus.EventPrimImpl
              org.smartfrog.sfcore.workflow.components.Terminator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.rmi.Remote, MessageKeys, RemoteTags, RemoteTagsComponent, Diagnostics, Liveness, Prim, Update, RemoteReferenceResolver, RemoteReferenceResolverHelper, EventAware, EventBus, EventRegistration, EventSink
public class Terminator
extends EventPrimImpl
implements Prim

This component sends an sfTerminate to the component referenced by its "kill" attribute. If it succeeded, it terminates normally, otherwise returns the failure Attributes are documented in Terminator.sf
